summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Nineteenth Avenue and Nineteenth Avenue North, in the City of Seattle, from East Madison Street to East Harrison Street, by constructing water mains therein, of proper dimensions, together with such gates, tees, crosses, fire hydrants and other appurtenances as may be necessary for the reasonable water service and fire protection of said portion of said street, in accordance with Resolution No. 601 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
